name: SoundCloud - Quite Color Change
description: Change the default orange color on SoundCloud!
additional_info: ! Please read this messages below before you will post a comment! NOTE: This style doesn't change background to dark mode. To make it happen you need to install SoundCloud - Quite Dark style. DISCLAIMER: Color selector works only with Stylish extension. With Stylus doesn't work :( But you can easly change filter var in the code to other than a default blue :)
